channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Integrated Dell Remote Access Controller (iDRAC)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Integrated Dell Remote Access Controller (iDRAC)

item.title: CVE-2021-21578|2024-08-03T18:16:23.581Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%20%28idrac%29
item.description: Dell EMC iDRAC9 versions prior to 4.40.40.00 contain an open redirect vulnerability. A remote unauthenticated attacker may exploit this vulnerability to redirect users to arbitrary web URLs by tricking the victim users to click on maliciously crafted links.

item.title: CVE-2021-21544|2024-08-03T18:16:22.987Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%20%28idrac%29
item.description: Dell EMC iDRAC9 versions prior to 4.40.00.00 contain an improper authentication vulnerability. A remote authenticated malicious user with high privileges could potentially exploit this vulnerability to manipulate the username field under the comment section and set the value to any user.

item.title: CVE-2021-21541|2024-08-03T18:16:22.955Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%20%28idrac%29
item.description: Dell EMC iDRAC9 versions prior to 4.40.00.00 contain a DOM-based cross-site scripting vulnerability. A remote unauthenticated attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability by tricking a victim application user to supply malicious HTML or JavaScript code to DOM environment in the browser. The malicious code is then executed by the web browser in the context of the vulnerable web application.

item.title: CVE-2021-21510|2024-08-03T18:16:22.982Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%20%28idrac%29
item.description: Dell iDRAC8 versions prior to 2.75.100.75 contain a host header injection vulnerability. A remote unauthenticated attacker may potentially exploit this vulnerability by injecting arbitrary ‘Host’ header values to poison a web-cache or trigger redirections.

item.title: CVE-2021-21543|2024-08-03T18:16:22.976Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%20%28idrac%29
item.description: Dell EMC iDRAC9 versions prior to 4.40.00.00 contain multiple stored cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. A remote authenticated malicious user with high privileges could potentially exploit these vulnerabilities to store malicious HTML or JavaScript code through multiple affected parameters. When victim users access the submitted data through their browsers, the malicious code gets executed by the web browser in the context of the vulnerable application.

item.title: CVE-2021-21540|2024-08-03T18:16:23.006Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%20%28idrac%29
item.description: Dell EMC iDRAC9 versions prior to 4.40.00.00 contain a stack-based overflow vulnerability. A remote authenticated attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to overwrite configuration information by injecting arbitrarily large payload.

item.title: CVE-2021-21579|2024-08-03T18:16:23.474Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%20%28idrac%29
item.description: Dell EMC iDRAC9 versions prior to 4.40.40.00 contain an open redirect vulnerability. A remote unauthenticated attacker may exploit this vulnerability to redirect users to arbitrary web URLs by tricking the victim users to click on maliciously crafted links.

item.title: CVE-2021-21542|2024-08-03T18:16:23.093Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%20%28idrac%29
item.description: Dell EMC iDRAC9 versions prior to 4.40.10.00 contain multiple stored cross-site scripting vulnerabilities. A remote authenticated malicious user with high privileges could potentially exploit these vulnerabilities to store malicious HTML or JavaScript code through multiple affected while generating a certificate. When victim users access the submitted data through their browsers, the malicious code gets executed by the web browser in the context of the vulnerable application.

item.title: CVE-2021-21538|2024-08-03T18:16:22.983Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%20%28idrac%29
item.description: Dell EMC iDRAC9 versions 4.40.00.00 and later, but prior to 4.40.10.00, contain an improper authentication vulnerability. A remote unauthenticated attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to gain access to the virtual console.

item.title: CVE-2021-21581|2024-08-03T18:16:23.519Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%20%28idrac%29
item.description: Dell EMC iDRAC9 versions prior to 5.00.00.00 contain a cross-site scripting vulnerability. A remote attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to run malicious HTML or JavaScript in a victim’s browser by tricking a victim in to following a specially crafted link.

item.title: CVE-2021-21580|2024-08-03T18:16:23.446Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%20%28idrac%29
item.description: Dell EMC iDRAC8 versions prior to 2.80.80.80 & Dell EMC iDRAC9 versions prior to 5.00.00.00 contain a Content spoofing / Text injection, where a malicious URL can inject text to present a customized message on the application that can phish users into believing that the message is legitimate.

item.title: CVE-2021-21539|2024-08-03T18:16:22.969Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%20%28idrac%29
item.description: Dell EMC iDRAC9 versions prior to 4.40.00.00 contain a Time-of-check Time-of-use (TOCTOU) race condition vulnerability. A remote authenticated attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges when a user with higher privileges is simultaneously accessing iDRAC through the web interface.

item.title: CVE-2021-21577|2024-08-03T18:16:23.446Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%20%28idrac%29
item.description: Dell EMC iDRAC9 versions prior to 4.40.40.00 contain a DOM-based cross-site scripting vulnerability. A remote attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to run malicious HTML or JavaScript in a victim’s browser by tricking a victim in to following a specially crafted link.

item.title: CVE-2021-21576|2024-08-03T18:16:23.558Z -- dell -- integrated%20dell%20remote%20access%20controller%20%28idrac%29
item.description: Dell EMC iDRAC9 versions prior to 4.40.40.00 contain a DOM-based cross-site scripting vulnerability. A remote attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to run malicious HTML or JavaScript in a victim’s browser by tricking a victim in to following a specially crafted link.
